title: DAILY REWARD
footer: You can pick one reward every 24 hours. If you want claim later just write /daily command.
cooldown: You can claim next reward in {cooldown}
rewardReady: You can claim your daily reward (/daily)
rewardReady_notification:
<size=13><color=white>REWARD AVAILABLE!</color></size>
Don't forget to claim your daily reward, type <color=#e4af3b>/daily</color> to claim.
rewardClaim_notification: has been added to your inventory!
